creator: kaheru81@gmail.com
text:
The get(RETR) radio button being reset to put(STOR).

First situation:
A controller had 2 FTP Request (FR1 and FR2). FR1 is being set as get(RETR) and FR2 is being set as put(STOR). If you click on FR2 and then click on FR1, the get(RETR) of FR1 will be reset to put(STOR)

Second situation:
You save a test plan containing 10 FTP Request, 5 were set to get(RETR) and 5 were set to put(STOR). When you open the test plan (after you close JMeter and open JMeter back OR change between test plan), all the FTP request will be set to put(STOR).

Thanks, this has already been reported.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44625 ***
creator: sebb@apache.org
